amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $65 million for the W76-2 warhead and transfer it to the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to strike $65 million for the W76-2 warhead and transfer it to Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 241 (Roll no. 247).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 241 (Roll no. 247).
